title: Programme Kraken Looking for Players

embed.description: What is programme kraken (pk)? -programme kraken is a league of legends training programme Who is involved in pk? -pk is directed by burstfire (one of krakens lol coaches) with the assistance of keefe (a manager for kraken) -players can be any rank or skill level as long as their attitude i...

body: hey guys. kraken has created a bootcamp to help players improve. members will be invited to participate in bi-weekly scrims and work with coaches to develop a personalized plan to achieve their goal as well as 1 on 1 coaching outside of practice. for more info on the bootcamp as well as how to apply check out this doc. thanks
